func.title: SetBridgeActionData

param.name: move_clonk
param.desc: Whether the clonk is supposed to move with the bridge.

param.name: build_wall
param.desc: true if the clonk is meant to build a ceiling above his head instead of a bridge underneath his feet.

param.name: bridge_material
param.desc: Material number of the material to be used for the bridge.

func.desc: Sets additional parameters for a currently executed BRIDGE procedure of the calling object.
func.remark: Removed in 9.0 OC. You can draw bridges on an object via effects and DrawMaterialQuad.
